title: [...] or, A brief relation of an atheisticall creature, living at Lambert, which is of a strange opinion that his sins are too big for him to goe to heaven, and too little for him to goe to hell, he thinks he shall dye a Pharisie: further he desired to have a commission to burne every new marryed couple in the buttock. [sic] but paying him forty shillings they should escape unburnedÂ· To the tune of, Jesper Cunningams, or Brave Lord Willoby.
